full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 36 of 228 LC2VMAX2 Rocchio - Direct 1 BY MS. POMERANTZ: 2 Q. Dr. Rocchio, have you interviewed any witnesses in this case? 3 A. No, I have not. 4 Q. Do you know who the witnesses in this case are? 5 A. I do not. 6 Q. Has the government provided you with any specific details about this case? 7 A. No. 8 Q. Are you aware of press and news reporting relating to the allegations of this case? 9 A. I'm aware of it, yes. 10 Q. Do you have any personal knowledge of the facts of this case? 11 A. I do not. 12 Q. To be clear, when you are describing aspects of childhood sexual abuse today, will your testimony be based on information from this specific case? 13 A. No, it will not. 14 Q. Dr. Rocchio, what, if any, compensation are you receiving for testifying today? 15 A. I'm being compensated for the time spent preparing to testify and the time spent testifying. 16 Q. What kind of basis is that done? 17 A. I'm being paid hourly for my time. 18 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012321

text_blocks.content: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 36 of 228 LC2VMAX2 Rocchio - Direct

BY MS. POMERANTZ: Q. Dr. Rocchio, have you interviewed any witnesses in this case? A. No, I have not. Q. Do you know who the witnesses in this case are? A. I do not. Q. Has the government provided you with any specific details about this case? A. No. Q. Are you aware of press and news reporting relating to the allegations of this case? A. I'm aware of it, yes. Q. Do you have any personal knowledge of the facts of this case? A. I do not. Q. To be clear, when you are describing aspects of childhood sexual abuse today, will your testimony be based on information from this specific case? A. No, it will not. Q. Dr. Rocchio, what, if any, compensation are you receiving for testifying today? A. I'm being compensated for the time spent preparing to testify and the time spent testifying. Q. What kind of basis is that done? A. I'm being paid hourly for my time.

additional_notes: The document is a court transcript with clear and legible text. There are no visible redactions or damage.
